title: Looks Like Hermes but maybe not
content:
To me this looks like Hermes Bold **except** that the point inside the ’M’ is more pointy in this example.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065540im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MIX_4352.jpg)

 [‹ is this Einhorn in oblique?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065540/http:/typophile.com/node/51469 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hi Everyone, Can Anyone ID This Font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065540/http:/typophile.com/node/51459 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jon Whipple

comments.content: It’s also very close to [Garage Gothic Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065540/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/GarageGothic/styles).
Close, but whitespace in the M is too curvy in Garage Gothic.
